# pausesIncomingScene

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the incoming scene is paused during the transition.

## Declaration

```swift
var pausesIncomingScene: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Pausing

- **pausesOutgoingScene**: A Boolean value that determines whether the outgoing scene is paused during the transition.
